subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Nets forward Richard Jefferson announced Friday that he was donating $3.5 million to his alma mater, the University of Arizona, to help build a multisport practice facility. The planned $20 million project is expected to be completed by September 2008. Jefferson played at Arizona from 1999 to 2001.
